data.title: Romance Languages
data.meta_description: As a graduate of the Universidad de Sevilla Law School, Manuel Mantero obtained his Doctorate from the Universidad de Salamanca and was professor in the universities of Sevilla and Madrid. In 1969 he left Spain to be Professor of Spanish at Western Michigan University, arriving in 1973 at the University of Georgia where he retired in 2000 as a Distinguished Research Professor of Spanish.
